requestBody.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status API Trace

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Digest mode (daily summary vs realtime)". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
